data.title: Amanda Martin biography: where is the Iron Resurrection star now?
data.meta_description: AMANDA MARTIN and her husband, Joe are both stars of the reality TV show, Iron Resurrection. Find out top facts about her family, career, net worth and more.
data.text:
Amanda Martin is a television star, business owner, and former top banking executive. She features on Discovery Channel's reality series Iron Resurrection alongside her husband and other castmates. She co-owns the custom vehicle building and fabrication company named Martin Bros Customs.

Amanda joined Iron Resurrection when it began five years ago. The first season of Iron Resurrection was aired in 2016 and it has continued on the Discovery Channel to date.

Profile summary

Name: Amanda Martins (Maiden name: Amanda Jill Keathley)

Date of birth: December 11, 1973

Place of birth: Red Oak, Texas, United States of America

Age: 47 years (as of April 2021)

Height: 5 ft 8 in

Nationality: American

Ethnicity: White

Marital Status: Married

Profession: Reality TV star, a former banker

Net worth: $700,000

Amanda Martin bio

Amanda Martin hails from Red Oak, Texas, the United States of America, and her maiden name is Keathley. Her siblings are her brother, Zack Keathley, and sister Wendi Blank.

Her mother is Sandi Klapp Nafziger, and her father was Zachariah J Keathley Jr. Amanda's late dad was a US Army World War II veteran who passed away on November 1, 2006, at a good old age of 86 years; he was born in 1920.

How old is Amanda Mandi Martin?

Iron Resurrection cast Amanda age is 47 years, she will turn 48 years old on December 11, 2021.

Educational background

Iron Resurrection Amanda Martin received her high school education at the Red Oak High School, Texas.

Career summary

Before Joe Martin wife became a famous TV face, she worked in the banking industry for several years. She was an employee of an American multinational financial company named Wells Fargo.

She worked in the company for four years, from March 2007 to December 2011, and she rose in ranks to become VP, Branch Manager.

After she stopped working at Wells Fargo, she joined Pioneer Bank. She worked in Pioneer Bank as Assistant Vice President, and as Deposit Operations Vice President and Product Manager after she got promoted.

Amanda left her financial sector to join her husband's business and TV show. She co-owns the automobile building and refurbishing and customization company Martin Bros Customs with her husband.

She became a television star after their automobile business was picked up for a reality show titled Iron Resurrection by Discovery Channel. Amanda and her husband are co-stars on the show.

The show has improved Martin Bros Customs' popularity to the extent that they now have their own branded merchandise that includes T-shirts, face caps, and other items.

Iron Resurrection involves Joe, Amanda, and other castmates searching Texas Countryside for old motorcycles and cars they can fix and make brand new again.

Joe, unlike his wife, has been in the automobile business for many years. Iron Resurrection is also not his first experience of working on a reality television series. In 2004, he was named the winner of the World Championship Biker Build-Off competition series on Discovery Channel.

Iron Resurrection has already run for four seasons.

Where is Iron Resurrection star Amanda Martin now?

The former banker and her husband, along with the other cast and crew of the show are currently filming season five of Iron Resurrection.

When she has some free time from working on cars, she enjoys spending quality time with her lovely dogs named Hazel, Dolly, Blue and Flea (who actually have their own Instagram account). The Martin family enjoys rescuing dogs, so maybe soon there will be some new additions to their home.

Net worth

Amanda Martin Iron Resurrection currently has a net worth of $700,000. The figures of her husband's net worth is quite higher than hers.

What is Joe Martin's net worth?

Joe's net worth is estimated to be around $1 million.

Marriage and family

To the folks who are asking â€” are Joe Martin and Amanda Martin married? The answer to this is a straight yes.

Amanda became Joe's wife several years ago; the pair are yet to reveal the exact date of their wedding to the public. Currently, Joe Martin age is 52 years.

Joe's date of birth is April 16, 1969. He hails from Chicago, Illinois, specifically.

The Martins currently reside in Johnson City, Texas, with their dogs. It is believed that they do not have children yet.

Amanda Martin is an accomplished banker turned successful reality TV star. She left her impressive career in the banking sector to join her husband's car-building business and reality television show.
